static checkIfUserIsClient(userHashID, projectID='', processID='')¶

See if the user is the client of either the project or the process

Parameters:

  • userHashID (Str) – The hashed ID of the user/organization

  • projectID (Str) – The ID of the project

  • processID (Str) – The ID of the process

Returns:

True if user is client, false if not

Return type:

Bool

static createDataEntry(data, dataID, processID, typeOfData: code_SemperKI.definitions.DataType, createdBy: str, details={}, IDofData='')¶

Create an entry in the Data table

Parameters:

  • data (Dict in JSON) – The data itself

  • dataID (Str) – The ID of that date

  • processID (str) – process it belongs to

  • typeOfData (DataType) – The type of this data

  • createdBy (Str) – Who created it (hashed ID)

  • details (JSON Dict) – Some metadata

  • IDofData (Str) – If the data has an id, save it

Returns:

Nothing

Return type:

None

static updateProject(projectID, updateType: code_SemperKI.definitions.ProjectUpdates, content)¶

Change details of an project like its status.

Parameters:

  • projectID (str) – project ID that this project belongs to

  • updateType (EnumUpdates) – changed project details

  • content (json dict) – changed project, can be many stuff

Returns:

Flag if it worked or not

Return type:

Bool

static updateProcess(projectID, processID, updateType: code_SemperKI.definitions.ProcessUpdates, content, updatedBy) → tuple[str, dict] | Exception¶

Change details of a process like its status, or save communication.

Parameters:

  • projectID (str) – The project ID, not necessary here

  • processID (str) – unique processID to be edited

  • updateType (EnumUpdates) – changed process details

  • content (json dict) – changed process, can be many stuff

Returns:

The relevant thing that got updated, for event queue

Return type:

tuple[str,dict]|Exception

static deleteFromProcess(projectID, processID, updateType: code_SemperKI.definitions.ProcessUpdates, content, deletedBy)¶

Delete details of a process like its status, or content.

Parameters:

  • projectID (str) – Project that this process belongs to, not needed here

  • processID (str) – unique process ID to be edited

  • updateType (EnumUpdates) – changed process details

  • content (json dict) – deletions

Returns:

Flag if it worked or not

Return type:

Bool

static getInfoAboutProjectForWebsocket(projectID: str, processID: str, event: str, eventContent, notification: str, clientOnly: bool, creatorOfEvent: str)¶

Retrieve information about the users connected to the project from the database.

Parameters:

  • projectID (str) – project ID to retrieve data from

  • processID (str) – The process ID affected

  • event (str) – the event that happens

  • eventContent (Any) – The content that triggered the event

  • notification (str) – The notification that wants to be send

Returns:

Dictionary of users with project ID and processes in order for the websocket to fire events

Return type:

Dict

static checkIfFilesAreRemote(projectID: str, processID: str) → bool¶

If at least one file is remote, say so to trigger upload to remote for new files as well

Parameters:

  • projectID (str) – The ID of the project that the process is part of

  • processID (str) – The ID of the process in question

Returns:

True if remote, false if local

Return type:

bool

static addProjectToDatabase(session)¶

Add project and processes for that user. Check if user already has a project and append if so, create a new process if not.

session (session dict) – session of user

Returns:
